name: 4&1/2 Lives
description:
My Ludum Dare Comp submission.

This is my first time publishing a game and the first time doing art or music ever.

On top of that I didn't even clear my schedule, so I've had to submit with 12hours still to go.

If I had more time I would probably do the following:
- Better music
- More animations
- Fix the performance issues from the procedural generation
- Make the procedural generation a little more intelligent
- Add obstacles or interactable objects to make the gameplay more complex

Where the game goes from here:
- Quite simply it doesn't. Better games in this genre already exist there is no need for anyone to make this particular one better. That being said the source code is available to the public. So if you want to, I ain't gonna stop you.

Feedback:
- I welcome any and all feedback. BE BRUTAL! It's how I know I'm alive.
